model.perceptron

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.perceptron.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

    Implementation of a matrix system which will be used in the neural network representation and training

    Version:
    1.0 - 17/11/15
    Author:
    BOIZUMAULT Romain, BUSSENEAU Alexis, GEFFRAULT Luc, MATHIEU Vianney, VAILLAND Guillaume
